_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Paneldactyl
author: Matheusn.biolowons@gmail.com
description:
💎 Egg: Paneldacty
⚙️ Version: 1.1
❓ What: An easy and practical way to test other panels With this Egg it is possible to install a Pterodactyl/Jexactyl panel in its own panel, literally a Panel inside another Panel (Panel only, Wings to another Egg if I can get it)
� � Fixed bugs/changelogs:
 • (1.0) Release.
 • (1.0) Possibility to execute subcommands in the terminal. (composer, setup, database, migrate, user, build, reinstall).
 • (1.0) System that does the "file integrity" check (does the reinstall if something is not found installed).\ n • (1.0) Possibility of being able to build the panel (better for those who want to create their own themes/customizations).
 • (1.0) System that performs the verification if the Egg is up to date.
 • (1.0) Everything is done by scripts, better maintenance and updating.
 • (1.1) Added Developer Mode. 
 • (1.1) Possibility to clone Panels directly from GitHub (Public/Private).
 📝 Variables: 
 • (1.0) Version.\ n • (1.0) Dashboard. `(Pterodactyl, Jexactyl, Jexactyl Brasil)`.
 • (1.0) Update Notices.
 • (1.1) Developer Mode
 • (1.1) URL of GIT Repository
 • (1.1) Choose Branch
 • (1.1) Git Username
 • (1.1) Git Access Token
 \ ud83d� Docker: 
 • Compatibility with ARM64, ARM, 64x
⚠️ Attention:
 ❗❗❗❗❗❗❗’ requires a database 
 ❕This Egg is very light, the only peaks will be every 1 min, because of the cron execution of the panel.
👑 Author: Ashu
\ ud83d� Check for updates: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Connect%20(pt-BR)/Paneldactyl/start.sh -o start.sh
chmod a+x ./start.sh
echo "1.1" > logs/egg_version

variables.name: Version
variables.description: Panel version, latest will install the latest version.

variables.name: Panel
variables.description: Choose which panel Egg will install, Currently there are these 3 options: Pterodactyl, Jexactyl, Jexactyl Brasil

variables.name: Update Notices
variables.description: Enable/Disable Egg Update notifications in terminal

variables.name: Developer Mode
variables.description: Enable this if you are using this Egg to develop a theme/customization, this command will run: Composer, Migrate, Permissions every time the Egg Initializes. (Build does not is on the list as it consumes a lot of computing power and may be unnecessary many times)

variables.name: GIT Repository URL
variables.description:
GitHub repo to clone, use only if you want to clone your own dashboard.

EX: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/repo_name

variables.name: Choose Branch
variables.description:
Which branch to pull from Github.

Default is blank to pull the default branch from the repo
